name: Returns and Store Credits V1
query:
Select name as "ID:Link/Sales Invoice:150", 
customer as "Customer:Link/Customer:150", 
base_grand_total as "Total:Curency:100", 
posting_date as "Date:Date:100", 
is_return as "Is Return:Check:100", 
ifw_is_store_credit as "Is Store Credit:Check:100"
from `tabSales Invoice`
Where is_return = 1
and posting_date >= Date(NOW()- INTERVAL 8 HOUR)
